trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were no other sightings in Sacramento on or around December 19th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking from my neighbors house when I saw a hovering object in the sky and it wasn't moving at all, just hovering. And I was like what the heck is that it looks just like a UFO! I was scared and excited at the same time! Then I went back inside my house trying to get the camera, and when i stepped outside... it was gone!!!
Summary: It was just hovering above one house and after I came back out it was gone.
